projects.name: Smart Gym
projects.description: Smart Gym is a full-stack MERN application for gym management, featuring QR code check-ins, class booking, member and trainer profiles, and a caf√© ordering system with Stripe integration.

projects.name: Project Beta
projects.description: A mobile application for fitness tracking, including workout logging and progress visualization.

general_questions.question: What is your primary tech stack?
general_questions.answer: My primary tech stack includes React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB for web development, and React Native for mobile applications.

general_questions.question: Where can I see more of your work?
general_questions.answer: You can find more of my work on my GitHub profile and my personal portfolio website.
